Question.Subject: Do I need to pay the outstanding amount for domain registration?
Question.Content: Hi I have registered a domain name in one.com for $15. This company belongs to Europe. I have not used that domain afterwards. Next year they sent a post to my address and sent a mail that your outstanding amount is $43.In terms & conditions they specified like you have to send the cancellation request. Will it cause any major legal issues if I don't care about this. Need help please.
Question.ChosenAnswer: it seems you've been conned. Just send the cancellation request. It will be hard to avoid legal issues if you signed some kind of agreement. Or find a lawyer.

Answer.Content: it seems you've been conned. Just send the cancellation request. It will be hard to avoid legal issues if you signed some kind of agreement. Or find a lawyer.
Cancel your account and register your domain with http://www.goldpuma.com or http://www.godaddy.com. Both are cheap and reliable services.
